overview:
Resilient Labs’ flagship product is Performance Desk a cloud application for small business.

It gives entrepreneurs, start-ups and small business access to a sales, marketing, support, user registration and virtual office tool-set based on web 2.0 technologies.

With this application users will be able to perform business functions anywhere anytime over the internet for a low monthly subscription rate.
